block.comment: If the timeframes list has values then we want to upsert the values in Snowflake
This section of the recipe contains steps that are used to update the various Snowflake Tables that store the information from Clari
Cause a failure due to an unexpected error
If the error from the above steps was thrown due to an actual error, we need to fail the job with the actual error
If the error was thrown becuse the report was dowloaded then we need to perform the actions of adding the value into the referenced Snowflake tables
Once the job status is set to Done or the there is an unexpected error this step will catch those errors

fieldsList.fieldValue: The Workato Team will get this message but if it's urgent please reach out to the Workato Team for resolution of this error.

block.comment: Cause the overall job to fail due to an unexpted error
Catch any unexpected errors that might have occured from this recipe
